column1: Little Goat Diner////One of my FAV so far for brunch. Sure the line is super long and it takes forever to get seated
column2: but I don't mind. The place is super cute and witty. I loved all the signs and the boxed water! The bloody mary was also yummy to sip on while you wait. OH and the chocolate chunk cookies are a must
column3: Cookie Monster would so approve!! They are SOOO yummy and the best ever
column7: but it's so worth it! BEST cookie ever! If it weren't for the lines
column8: I'd def go more often because the dishes are unique and non brunch conforming. Now I just frequent there for the chocolate chunk cookies - in and out.
